authorInfo.title: About the Author

keyTakeaways.title: Key Takeaways
keyTakeaways.description: Effective sales funnels guide prospects through a logical sequence of value-building steps. Focus on removing friction and addressing objections at each stage.

emails.subject: Sales Funnel Blueprint: From Lead to Customer in 7 Steps
emails.preview: Dear Sales Professional, discover the exact 7-step blueprint that converts cold leads into paying customers with our proven funnel optimization strategies...
